geohash.build: cd geohash && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --target-dir target && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/geohash_canister.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/geohash_opt.wasm shrink

dip721_nft_container.build: cd dip721_nft_container && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --target-dir target && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/dip721_canister.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/dip721_opt.wasm shrink

nft-wallet.build: cd nft-wallet && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --target-dir target && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_wallet_canister.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_wallet_opt.wasm shrink

basic_ethereum.build: cd basic_ethereum && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --target-dir target && ic-wasm target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/basic_ethereum_canister.wasm -o target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/basic_ethereum.wasm shrink
